{{Wired embedded system |brand=Hardkernel |model=ODROID-N2 |revision=+ (rev 0.6) |asin=B09W8RBJS4 |manuf_country=Korea |is_manuf=No |availability=Currently Shipping |price=63 |est_release_date=07/2020 |type=single-board computer |pwr_v=7.5-16 |pwr_amp=2-4 |pwr_conn=barrel |pwr_barrel_outer=5.5 |pwr_barrel_inner=2.1 |pwr_barrel_len=9.5 |cpu1_brand=Amlogic |cpu1_model=S922X |cpu1_cspeed=2.0-2.2 GHz |cpu1_cores=6 |fla1=8 |fla1_brand=XTX Tech |fla1_model=XT25Q64D |fla2=512 KiB |fla2_brand=XTX Tech |fla2_model=XT25F01D |ram1=2 GiB |ram1_brand=Samsung |ram1_model=K4A8G165WC-BCTD |ram1_num=2 |expansion_if_types=USB 2.0 (OTG), USB 3.0 |expansion_usb_num=5 |serial=yes,, 4-pin header,, populated,, 1.8V TTL,, (115200 8N1) |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211F |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |addl_chips=CMOS Real Time Clock;NXP;PCF8563;;1;,,, USB 3.1 Gen 1 Hub Controller;Genesys Logic;GL3523;;1;,,, 3-Vrms Audio Driver with Adjustable Gain;DIOO Micro;DIO2133;;1;,,, 3.3V 8A Synchronous Buck Converter w/ 100mA LDO;MPS;NB680;;1;,,, 18V 2A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;Silergy Corp;SY8120B;;2;,,, 300mA Ultra Low Current Voltage Regulator;First Silicon;FC6232;;1;,,, 500mA Bypass Capacitor CMOS LDO Regulator;Richtek;RT9013;;1;,,, 28V 6A Synchronous Step-Down Regulator;Silergy;SY8366H;;1;,,, 26V 6A Synchronous Step-Down Converter;MPS;MP8756;;2;,,, 2-Channel ESD Protection for USB 3.0;TI;TPD2EUSB30;;8;,,, USB Power Distribution Switch;First Silicon;FC9516A;;2;,,, 300mA CMOS Linear Regulator;First Silicon;FC8731;;3;,,, 0.2A Single Channel Load Switch;Diodes Inc;AP2331;;1;,,, Single Channel Current-Limited Power Switch for USB;JoulWatt;JW7111;;4; |flags=Micro SD Card slot, eMMC module connector, HDMI 2.0, Audio/CVBS, SPDIF out, IR receiver, RTC w/ battery, SPI, I2C, ADC header, UART, GPIO, fan header, heatsink |stock_os=Linux;4.9.312;Ubuntu 22.04; |tp_firmware=Arch Linux (Arm), Armbian, Debian, Manjaro ARM, DietPi, CoreELEC, Volumio, Android PIE |default_ip=acquired via DHCP |default_user=odroid |default_pass=odroid |oui_eth=00:1E:06 }} {{TagLine|Single Board Computer - ODROID-N2+}} :[https://www.hardkernel.com/shop/odroid-n2-with-2gbyte-ram-2/ Product page]
"ODROID-N2+", "REV 0.6 20210121", "R-R-HKL-ODROID-N2", and "HARDKERNEL" :are silkscreened on board top. "Design by ruppi.kim@hardkernel.com" is silkscreened on board bottom.
eMMC module connector with modules of 8GB, 16GB, 32GB, 64GB and 128GB available. {{See also|ODROID#Models|List of Single-board computers}}
===Links=== *[https://wiki.odroid.com/odroid-n2/odroid-n2 ''ODROID-N2'' on '''ODROID''' Wiki] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2020/07/16/odroid-n2-plus-sbc-gets-amlogic-s922x-rev-c-processor-clocked-at-up-to-2-4-ghz/ ''ODROID-N2 Plus SBC Gets Amlogic S922X Rev. C'' on '''CNX|Software'''] *[https://www.cnx-software.com/2021/11/08/odroid-n2-plus-review-ubuntu-21-10/ ''ODROID-N2+ review with Ubuntu 21.10'' on '''CNX|Software''']
===Hardware specification=== *CPU: [[Amlogic]] S922X (ARMv8-A) :4x ARM (Cortex-A73) @2.2GHz and :2x ARM (Cortex-A53) @2.0GHz *GPU: Mali-G52 @864MHz *Storage: 8MB (SPI) flash, SDHC Card slot, :eMMC 4.5 connector *RAM: 2GB (DDR4) @1320MHz *USB: 4x USB 3.0, 1x micro USB 2.0 (OTG) ports *Network: 1x GbE port *Power: 12V/2A via barrel recommended
==Images== <gallery> File:ODROID-N2+ Top.jpeg|Board Top File:ODROID-N2+ Bottom.jpeg|Board Bottom </gallery>[[Has images::internal| ]]
